Name: Dandelion and Burdock Infusion
Description: Made from Dandelion and Burdock Root. Used to make Dandelion and Burdock Soda.

DescriptionLocalization.de: Hergestellt aus Löwenzahn und Klettenwurzel. Wird zur Herstellung von Löwenzahn- und Klettensoda verwendet.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Feita de dente-de-leão e raiz de bardana. Usada para fazer refrigerante de dente-de-leão e bardana.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Karahindiba ve Lö?lek kökünden yap?ld?. Karahindibal? ve Lö?lekli Soda yapmak için kullan?l?r.
